name: auto-mcs
description: Auto-MCS is a GUI-based tool for automatically deploying and configuring Minecraft servers with mod support. It reduces the manual setup process and is suitable for gaming communities and self-hosters.
features: Minecraft Server Management: Automated deployment and configuration. Easy server setup.
Mod Support: Install and manage mods automatically. Enhanced gameplay.
GUI Interface: User-friendly graphical interface. No command line needed.
Automated Setup: Reduces manual configuration work. Quick deployment.
Server Configuration: Easy tweaking of server settings. Complete control.
Gaming Communities: Perfect for community server hosting. Multiplayer ready.
Cross-Platform: Desktop apps for Linux, Windows, and macOS. Universal compatibility.
Self-Hosted: Run your own Minecraft servers. Complete ownership.
